```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
#Import Data
CA <- read_csv("../Source Data/CA-Data/ca.csv")
DE <- read_csv("../Source Data/DE-Data/de.csv")
UK <- read_csv("../Source Data/UK-Data/uk.csv")
US18 <- read_csv("../Source Data/US-Data/us_18Q1.csv")
US19 <- read_csv("../Source Data/US-Data/nmurx_us_19Q1.csv")
```


```{r}
#Export cleaned data
write.csv(CA, "./CA_Clean.csv")
write.csv(DE, "./DE_Clean.csv")
write.csv(UK, "./UK_Clean.csv")
write.csv(US18, "./US18_Clean.csv")
write.csv(US19, "./US19_Clean.csv")
```
